pages.text: $(li)The Bastion Underground is a big dungeon that can be found over the Overworld.$(br)$(li)Be careful, this place is infested with $(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/skeleton)Skeletons$(/l).$(br)$(li)If you manage to reach the deepest point of this place, you will be able to obtain numerous $(l:patchouli:perks/loot_chest)Loot Chests$(/l).
